name: Descent of Tendo
description:
Our amazing AFK cards game Descent of Tendo has finally come! Here you will meet so many ninjas and write your exciting stories!

——Game Features——
[Collect tons of gifts]
Latest version available! We've prepared countless useful gifts to you!

[Upgrade multiple ninjas at a time]
Put your ninjas in Divine Tree and see their levels soar to the top!

[Relax yourself in Housing]
Have a good rest together with your pet in Housing! Don't forget to visit your friends'!

[Steel yourself in thrilling dungeons]
Land of Trials and more! Treasures are always hiding behind the dangers!
